Administration.text:
Type: Antidepressant
Dosage Forms:
Routes of Administration: oral
Common Trade Names: Desyrel

Adult_Dosing.text:
Insomnia: 50-100mg PO at bedtime
Depression: 150-600 mg/day in divided doses

Special_Populations.text:
Pregnancy Rating
: C
Lactation risk
: Infant risk cannot be ruled out
Renal dosing: no adjustment
Hepatic dosing: no adjustment

Contraindications.text:
Allergy to class/drug
MAOI use currently or in past 2 weeks
Concomitant use of saquinavir/ritonavir

Serious.text:
Prolonged QT, Torsades de pointes
Hypotension
Serotonin syndrome
Suicidal thoughts/behavior
Seizure
Priapism

Common.text:
Somnolence, dizziness, confusion, insomnia, anxiety, dream disorder
Headache, blurred vision
Constipation, nausea/vomiting, xerostomia
Backache

Pharmacology.text:
Half-life: 7h
Metabolism: Hepatic, CYP3A4
Excretion: Mostly renal

Mechanism_of_Action.text: Not well understood. May act like a SSRI. Also an Î±-1 adrenergic antagonist
